# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate object for the stack view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSStackViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system calls a delegate method when resizing has caused a view to be detached from or reattached to the stack view. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStackViewDelegate].

## Responding to Stack-Related Changes

- **NSStackViewDelegate**: A set of methods you use to respond to a stack view detaching and reattaching views.
